tags.name: Portal API
tags.description: Facade for consuming ENA Portal data services

get.summary: Get a list of available values for a controlled vocabulary field.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Field name

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result type (data set) to search against. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A set of search conditions joined by logical operators (AND, OR, NOT) and bound by double quotes. If none supplied, the full result set will be returned.

parameters.name: dataPortal
parameters.description: The data portal ID. Defaults to 'ena'.

parameters.name: dccDataOnly
parameters.description: Whether to limit the search to only DCC records. By default, all public data is also included in the search.

parameters.name: includeMetagenomes
parameters.description: Whether to include public metagenome data in the search. By default, these are not included. Note that any metagenome data associated with a DCC hub will always be included in a search against that DCC.

get.summary: Download the documentation as a PDF file.
Get file report from warehouse search

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result type (data set) to search against. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: accession
parameters.description: Accession

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of fields (comma separated) to be returned in the result. If none supplied, the accession and ftp information for fastq,submitted and sra files will be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: How many records to skip from the beginning in the results. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve. Default value is 100,000. If the full result set is to be fetched, the limit should be set to 0.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: What format the results should be returned as: TSV (Tab Separated Values) or JSON. By default, a TSV report is provided.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Whether to download the result as a file, rather than read it from the stream. By default, this is false.

parameters.name: accession
parameters.description: Sample accession

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result type of links.

parameters.description: How many records to skip from the beginning in the results. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve. Default value is 100,000. If the full result set is to be fetched, the limit should be set to 0.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: What format the results should be returned as: TSV (Tab Separated Values) or JSON. By default, a TSV report is provided.

parameters.name: result

parameters.name: offset

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve. Default value is 100,000. If the full result set is to be fetched, the limit should be set to 0.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: What format the results should be returned as: TSV (Tab Separated Values) or JSON. By default, a TSV report is provided.

parameters.name: accession
parameters.description: Taxon Id

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result type of links.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: How many records to skip from the beginning in the results. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve. Default value is 100,000. If the full result set is to be fetched, the limit should be set to 0.

parameters.name: subtree
parameters.description: Inlcude Subtree

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: What format the results should be returned as: TSV (Tab Separated Values) or JSON. By default, a TSV report is provided.

get.summary: Get a list of available result types (data sets) to search against.

parameters.name: dataPortal
parameters.description: Data portal Id

get.summary: Get a list of fields that can be returned for a result type.

parameters.name: dataPortal
parameters.description: Data portal Id

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: Result

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result type (data set) to search against. Is mandatory.

parameters.name: savedSearch
parameters.description: The id to download the results of a previously submitted search. If this parameter is set, all additional parameters are ignored.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A set of search conditions joined by logical operators (AND, OR, NOT) and bound by double quotes. If none supplied, the full result set will be returned.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of fields (comma separated) to be returned in the result. If none supplied, the accession and description/title of the main result object will be returned.

parameters.name: sortFields
parameters.description: A list of fields (comma separated) in the order of which the results should be sorted.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: How many records to skip from the beginning in the results. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve. Default value is 100,000. If the full result set is to be fetched, the limit should be set to 0.

parameters.name: dataPortal
parameters.description: The data portal ID. Defaults to 'ena'.

parameters.name: dccDataOnly
parameters.description: Whether to limit the search to only DCC records. By default, all public data is also included in the search.

parameters.name: includeMetagenomes
parameters.description: Whether to include public metagenome data in the search. By default, these are not included. Note that any metagenome data associated with a DCC hub will always be included in a search against that DCC.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: What format the results should be returned as: TSV (Tab Separated Values) or JSON. By default, a TSV report is provided.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Whether to download the result as a file, rather than read it from the stream. By default, this is false.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Submit search and be notified via email when search result is ready for downloading. Mandatory if fields=all is set.

post.summary: Perform a warehouse search with POST

parameters.name: sortFields
parameters.description: A list of fields (comma separated) in the order of which the results should be sorted.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: How many records to skip from the beginning in the results. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve. Default value is 100,000. If the full result set is to be fetched, the limit should be set to 0.

parameters.name: dataPortal
parameters.description: The data portal ID. Defaults to 'ena'.

parameters.name: dccDataOnly

parameters.name: includeMetagenomes
parameters.description: Whether to include public metagenome data in the search. By default, these are not included. Note that any metagenome data associated with a DCC hub will always be included in a search against that DCC.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Submit search and be notified via email when search result is ready for downloading. Mandatory if fields=all is set.

parameters.name: savedSearch
parameters.description: The id to download the results of a previously submitted search. If this parameter is set, all additional parameters are ignored.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: What format the results should be returned as: TSV (Tab Separated Values) or JSON. By default, a TSV report is provided.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Whether to download the result as a file, rather than read it from the stream. By default, this is false.

get.summary: Get a list of searchable fields for a result type.
